string_table.string: Closed captions. Press the spacebar to toggle captions on and off.
Skip navigation. Press enter to return to the slide.

slidetranscripts.slidetranscript: Thank parents for coming. We feel it is vitally important for you to understand the foundation and framework of our athletic program. We are training our coaches in what is known as 3Dimensional Coaching. Here’s a short video to help you understand the framework (next slide – play video)
No Notes. Just play video.
Explain that people are made up of three dimensions and the best coaches must address and use all three to get the highest performance from their athletes.

· The Fundamentals which represents the body that we call the Physicality of Sport

· Psychology or the combination of the body and the mind which we call Dualism. This deals with the mental/emotional/relational component of sport

· The Heart is the executive center of our being

· The combination of the body, mind and spirit which we call Holism.

1st Dimension is Sport-Specific. We recognize this is foundational to a sport. You have to be good at this. Really good level 1 coaches can win championships at this lev-el. They can also do a lot of damage along the way. Dr. Duke’s research along with personal experience confirms to us that somewhere between 75—85% of coaches are Level 1 coaches only. Meaning that if you went to their practice for a week, a month, a season and charted everything they intentionally do, it would fall into one of these categories.

All coaches recognize these attributes are important. Do they have a strategy, do they intentionally coach these? Only 10 to a maximum of 20% of coaches are Level 2.  We are training ALL of our coaches to be proficient at this level

Things you can do here:

· Define each of the attributes

· Expound on one or more of them (team cohesion matrix; one emotion that guarantees attitude & effort, etc.)

· An example of using a level 1 solution to solve a level 2 issue: running when teammates have conflict = behavior modification. Point can be made that running should not be used as a punishment—it is a level 1 solution not to be con-fused with a level 2 punishment.

3rd Dimension: The executive center of our being.

Sport is impacting this. Are we intentionally coaching it?

· If value is a level 3 function, what does the sports world value most? Winning. If winning is at the top then eventually all three dimensions will bow down to it.

· If you want to make the point on the effect of Winning as the purpose you can reference Hahm-Beller or Josephson Institute research distinguishing be-tween moral and performance character attributes.

Only 5—10% of coaches are Level 3: Having a strategy to coach for character and significance

In the sporting experience coaches have the leading role at Levels 1 & 2.  At Level 3 you as parents have the primary responsibility for Identity, Character, Value, Worth and Significance.

Parents, if we are going to optimize the effectiveness of our program and develop your son, your daughter wholly, you have a vital role to play.  We need to “align the sails” of the of the two most important groups of people in an athlete’s life: coaches and their parents/guardians.  If we are to do this all of us need to understand what role we play.  To that end there is a presentation we desire you to watch.  You do have a 1st dimension responsibility.  You have a 2nd dimension responsibility.  You have a crucial 3rd dimension responsibility.

If we all do our part we won’t just survive the sports journey, we will thrive!  (Here you can invite them to watch the 3D Parent video then sign up for more resources.  If you don’t plan to play the parent video be sure to run the feedback survey so that the video and other resources can be accessed individually.)

Feel free to review some of the options if there is time. We are going to take 3 minutes for you to fill out the information form on your phone….

GIVE THEM TIME WITH SILENCE TO COMPLETE. Anyone who selects interest in gaining more information will receive the information emailed to them, including the 3D Parenting video
